page.title: 17FARMING AND SERVICES
page.content: BARLOWENETH FARM IS A TYPICAL SMALL DAIRY FARM OF THE AREA.IT SURROUNDS ST.HILARY AND COVERS 80 ACRES.THE DAIRY HERD CONSISTS OF 85 GUERNSEY COWS WHICH PRODUCE 1,000 LITRES PER DAY OF FULL CREAM MILK.THE MILK IS SOLD TO UNIGATE DAIRES AT ST.ERTH. THE FARM PRODUCES ITS OWN SILAGE FOR WINTER FEED AND SEVERAL FIELDS ARE USED TO GROW POTATOES AND SPRING CABBAGES. THE FARMER AND HIS WIFE,WITH ONE PERMANENT FARM HAND MANAGES THE FARM.TEMPORARY WORKERS BEING TAKEN ON,AS AND WHEN NEEDED. {FARM SERVICES } THE LOCAL FAMILY BUSINESS OF T.F.HOSKING+CO WAS STARTED IN 1865.THEY SUPPLY AND SERVICE FARM MACHINERY ALL OVER CORNWALL.THE FIRM EMPLOYS 14 PEOPLE AND USE TWO SERVICE VANS FOR OUTLYING FARMS.
